combat_units.notes: Moroccan Spahis reconnaissance regiment - formation phase

support_units.notes: Artillery Regiment of Africa - formation phase
Indochinese pioneer companies attached to division

equipment.note: Equipment allocation during formation phase - specific quantities not documented in available sources for Q2 1943. Division equipped with French/Allied weapons during training in Morocco.

supply_logistics.notes: Division in formation/training status May-June 1943. Not operationally deployed. Water requirement based on standard 3L/person/day x 16,840 personnel.

weather_environment.notes: Morocco spring/early summer conditions (May-June 1943). Unit in training environment, not combat operations.

operations.notes: CRITICAL: Division formed May 1, 1943 in Morocco. Unit spent 1943-Q2 (May-June) in FORMATION AND TRAINING status. NO COMBAT OPERATIONS in North Africa. Tunisia Campaign ended May 13, 1943 - unit formed AFTER campaign concluded. Division deployed to Italy November 1943 for first combat operations.

personnel_composition.breakdown_notes: 60% Maghrebis (North Africans - primarily Moroccan), 40% Europeans, small Indochinese pioneer contingent

combat_evidence.reason: Unit formed May 1, 1943 AFTER Tunisia Campaign ended (May 13, 1943). Spent May-June 1943 in formation/training in Morocco. First combat operations in Italy (November 1943).
combat_evidence.north_africa_presence: Formation and training only - NO COMBAT PARTICIPATION

sources.title: 2nd Moroccan Infantry Division - Wikipedia
sources.author: Wikipedia contributors
sources.notes: Formation date, unit composition, personnel breakdown, commander information

sources.title: French Organizations - Italy WW2
sources.author: Custermen.com
sources.notes: Confirms deployment to Italy, not North Africa combat

sources.title: Web Search Results - 2e DIM Formation
sources.author: Multiple sources
sources.notes: Confirms May 1943 formation, embarkation from Bizerte November 1943, Italy deployment

validation.notes: TIER 3 PARTIAL: Formation/training data available. Unit existed during 1943-Q2 but was in formation/training status only. NO COMBAT in North Africa. Detailed equipment allocations during formation phase not available in sources. Personnel strength and organization documented from Italian deployment data (November 1943).

gap_documentation.recommendation: Consider removing from North Africa seed file - unit never participated in North Africa combat operations. Inclusion only justified if project scope includes 'units formed in North Africa' rather than 'units that fought in North Africa.'

seed_file_validity.reason: Unit never participated in North Africa combat. Formed after Tunisia Campaign ended. Only presence in North Africa was formation/training.
seed_file_validity.alternative_interpretation: If seed file includes 'units formed in North Africa region' rather than strictly 'combat participants,' then inclusion marginally justified for 1943-Q2 only (formation quarter).
